name: mixer-zk-circuits
description: ZK circuits for Solana mixer with Light Protocol integration

scripts.generate-zkey: snarkjs groth16 setup build/withdraw.r1cs pot/powersOfTau28_hez_final_16.ptau build/circuit_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute build/circuit_0000.zkey build/withdraw_final.zkey --name='First contribution' -v
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/withdraw_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
